Discovery Job Id 3 - POST-DISCOVERY➛JobDetailID is ready to complete

please return to the requested RITM: Trigger - Service Catalog➛...➛Number and download the RDP file

to login.  you have 20 mins to start the job

 

Reagards

Admin
